DOC.brief_summary: This study compares intraoperative fit of the patient-specific iTotal knee replacement to other standard knee replacement implants
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Fit of the iTotal Versus Standard Total Knee Implants
DOC.detailed_description: The study is designed as a single center, two arm analysis. The study will be completed in two phases, based on measurement type. All additional data will be obtained from pre and post-operative subject surveys, operative and discharge records and radiographs.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are scheduled for a standard total knee replacement Patient who are scheduled for patientspecific total knee replacement (iTotal) Patient age > 18 years Patients who do not receive a total knee replacement Unwilling or unable to comply with study requirements
